member.name: CD3D11_RECT.CD3D11_RECT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a structure that is initialized with a D3D11_RECT structure.
member.param: Address of the D3D11_RECT structure that initializes the CD3D11_RECT structure.

member.name: CD3D11_RECT.CD3D11_RECT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a structure that is initialized with the dimensions of a rectangle.
member.param: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

member.name: CD3D11_RECT.CD3D11_RECT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized structure.

member.name: CD3D11_RECT
member.summary: Represents a rectangle and provides convenience methods for creating rectangles.
